#?????????_????_20????? #??20 #THE RUSSIAN S-400 AIRCRAFT WAS DESTROYED BY THE DOWNED JEFF AIRCRAFT. He has more than 150 sorties under his belt. "Jef" fired about fifty HARM missiles and more than a dozen JDAM guided aerial bombs, shot down more than ten drones, destroyed enemy air defense more than once and covered Ukrainian attack aircraft dozens of times. November 23. "Jeff" gets into his MiG-29, loaded with American "HARM" missiles. The most important target is the Russian S-400, which is "hidden" behind Donetsk. He knows that the brothers will work as police officers, so if the "four hundred" is not destroyed first, the boys are in serious danger. Sumy region - air defense work on enemy anti-aircraft missiles!

Forwarded From Commander of the Air Force Mykola Oleschuk?? 24 IMPACT UAVS SHOT DOWN On the night of August 3, 2024, the enemy struck with two S-300 anti-aircraft guided missiles from the occupied territory of Donetsk region, two Kh-31P anti-radar missiles from the airspace over the Black Sea, as well as 29 strike UAVs of the "Shahed" type from the directions: Cape Chauda - Crimea, Primorsko-Akhtarsk, Kursk - Russian Federation. The air attack was repelled by mobile fire groups of the Defense Forces of Ukraine, anti-aircraft missile troops and units REB of the Air Force. As a result of the anti-aircraft battle, 24 attack UAVs of the "Shahed-131/136" type were shot down in the Kherson, Odesa, Mykolaiv, Poltava, Sumy, Dnipropetrovsk, Kyiv, Vinnytsia and Zhytomyr regions. Thank you for the combat work. ?? Together - to victory!? Air Force Commander Lieutenant General Mykola Oleschuk
